# Movie Mode

!Camera Display

## Default Settings

1. **SHUTTER SPEED**
2. **APERTURE**
3. **ISO**
4. **MOVIE MODE**
5. **BATTERY LEVEL**
6. **REMAINING TIME**
7. **TIME CODE**
8. **FILM SIMULATION**
9. **WHITE BALANCE**
10. **MOVIE FORMAT**
11. **SHOOTING MODE**
12. **CARD SLOT OPTIONS**
13. **Expo.Comp. & MIC LEVEL**

> **Note:**  
> MOVIE MODE, BATTERY LEVEL, and CARD SLOT OPTIONS cannot be changed in the settings.

## Checking the Functions Assigned to Function Buttons

The functions assigned to the **Fn1**, **Fn2**, and **Fn3** buttons in **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING** can be checked on the secondary LCD monitor.

1. **Fn1 button**
2. **Fn2 button**
3. **Fn3 button**
